author: Samuel12321
body:
The msix package is already distributed, it would make it a lot easier to get and keep updated if it was installable from the Microsoft Store.
Additionally as the package would be signed, it would allow msix package to be installable without having to switch to developer mode.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: MSFT team already announces this. They works on this internally.

comments.author: Samuel12321
comments.body:
sorry, i didn't see #7730 
Closing now.

title: Install from Microsoft Store
